Package uk.co.flax.biosolr.ontology.core

Interface OntologyHelper

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractOntologyHelper, OLSOntologyHelper, OLSTermsOntologyHelper, OWLOntologyHelper

    public interface OntologyHelper
    Interface defining ontology helper functionality.

    Created by Matt Pearce on 20/10/15.

    Author:
    Matt Pearce

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • updateLastCallTime

        void updateLastCallTime​()
        Update the last time this helper was called. This method should be called every time the helper is used.

      • getLastCallTime

        long getLastCallTime​()
        Returns:
        the last time this helper was called.

      • dispose

        void dispose​()
        Explicitly dispose of the helper class, closing down any resources in use.

      • isIriInOntology

        boolean isIriInOntology​(java.lang.String iri)
                 throws OntologyHelperException
        Check whether an IRI exists in the ontology (or ontologies) represented by this helper.
        Parameters:
        iri - the IRI to look for.
        Returns:
        true if the class corresponding to this IRI can be found, false if not.
        Throws:
        OntologyHelperException - if problems occur finding the IRI in the ontology.

      • findLabels

        java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> findLabels​(java.lang.String iri)
                                           throws OntologyHelperException
        Find the labels for a single OWL class.
        Parameters:
        iri - the IRI of the class whose labels are required.
        Returns:
        a collection of labels for the class. Never null.
        Throws:
        OntologyHelperException - if problems occur accessing the ontology.

      • findLabelsForIRIs

        java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> findLabelsForIRIs​(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> iris)
                                                  throws OntologyHelperException
        Find all of the labels for a collection of OWL class IRIs.
        Parameters:
        iris - the IRIs whose labels should be looked up.
        Returns:
        a collection of labels. Never null.
        Throws:
        OntologyHelperException - if problems occur accessing the ontology.

      • findSynonyms

        java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> findSynonyms​(java.lang.String iri)
                                             throws OntologyHelperException
        Find the synonyms for a class.
        Parameters:
        iri - the IRI of the class whose synonyms are required.
        Returns:
        the collection of synonyms. Never null.
        Throws:
        OntologyHelperException - if problems occur accessing the ontology.

      • findDefinitions

        java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> findDefinitions​(java.lang.String iri)
                                                throws OntologyHelperException
        Find all of the definitions for a class.
        Parameters:
        iri - the IRI of the class whose definitions are required.
        Returns:
        the definitions. Never null.
        Throws:
        OntologyHelperException - if problems occur accessing the ontology.

      • getChildIris

        java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getChildIris​(java.lang.String iri)
                                             throws OntologyHelperException
        Get the direct child IRIs for a class.
        Parameters:
        iri - the IRI of the class whose child IRIs are required.
        Returns:
        the child IRIs, as strings. Never null.
        Throws:
        OntologyHelperException - if problems occur accessing the ontology.

      • getDescendantIris

        java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getDescendantIris​(java.lang.String iri)
                                                  throws OntologyHelperException
        Get all descendant IRIs for a class, including direct children.
        Parameters:
        iri - the IRI of the class whose descendant IRIs are required.
        Returns:
        the descendant IRIs, as strings. Never null.
        Throws:
        OntologyHelperException - if problems occur accessing the ontology.

      • getParentIris

        java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getParentIris​(java.lang.String iri)
                                              throws OntologyHelperException
        Get the direct parent IRIs for a class.
        Parameters:
        iri - the IRI of the class whose parent IRIs are required.
        Returns:
        the parent IRIs, as strings. Never null.
        Throws:
        OntologyHelperException - if problems occur accessing the ontology.

      • getAncestorIris

        java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getAncestorIris​(java.lang.String iri)
                                                throws OntologyHelperException
        Get all ancestor IRIs for a class, including direct children.
        Parameters:
        iri - the IRI of the class whose ancestor IRIs are required.
        Returns:
        the ancestor IRIs, as strings. Never null.
        Throws:
        OntologyHelperException - if problems occur accessing the ontology.

      • getRelations

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Collection<java.lang.String>> getRelations​(java.lang.String iri)
                                                                             throws OntologyHelperException
        Retrieve a map of related classes for a particular class.
        Parameters:
        iri - the IRI of the class whose relations are required.
        Returns:
        a map of relation type to a list of IRIs for nodes with that relationship.
        Throws:
        OntologyHelperException - if problems occur accessing the ontology.

      • getParentPaths

        java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getParentPaths​(java.lang.String iri,
                                                      boolean includeLabels)
                                               throws OntologyHelperException
        Get the paths to the root node for a particular class.
        Parameters:
        iri - the IRI of the class whose parent paths are required.
        includeLabels - should the parent class labels be included.
        Returns:
        a collection of strings, each containing one full path to the root node.
        Throws:
        OntologyHelperException - if problems occur retrieving the parent nodes.
